name: Parabolic AI
description: Parabolic PAI (Parabolic Agentic Intelligence) is an AI-powered trading ecosystem where autonomous agents are trained to analyze, predict, and execute trading strategies in crypto markets. PAI agents are designed to learn, adapt, and optimize trading outcomes over time — combining predictive modeling, reinforcement learning, and real-time decision-making. The native token, $PAI, fuels this ecosystem by powering agent simulations, staking, governance, and user-agent interactions. It represents access to Parabolic’s AI infrastructure and forms the backbone of a permissionless, decentralized network of intelligent trading agents. In short: Parabolic PAI = AI agents + trading strategy intelligence + tokenized performance economy.
